thoughts: Is crying for milk to no avail
Attempts to snarl but can only manage a tiny mewl
Is crying for {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents, but no one comforts {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Doesn't know why it's suddenly so cold
Wishes to feel warmth at least once
Is clouded in confusion and fear
Feels trapped in the sticky mud
Misses the fleeting feeling of warmth at r_c's belly
Wishes that r_c could bathe {PRONOUN/m_c/object} again
